title: Ontology-Based Mathematical Learning Object Design and Recommendation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical-centered design enabling pre-/in-service teachers to use ontology-based learning object recommendation systems in mathematics education settings

learning_goals: By analyzing learning object metadata standards and ontology structures, learners can explain relationships between mathematical concepts.
Using SWRL rules, learners can design an algorithm to recommend mathematics learning objects tailored to individual learner levels.
Utilizing OWL-based knowledge representation tools, learners can collaborate with peer teachers to develop customized mathematics learning scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
